title: Global Nuclear Stocks Remain in Vogue After $566 Billion Rally
description: Global fund managers see this year’s surge in nuclear stocks continuing, on an improving regulatory outlook and demand drivers that extend beyond the voracious needs of artificial intelligence.
content: Global fund managers see this year’s surge in nuclear stocks continuing, on an improving regulatory outlook and demand drivers that extend beyond the voracious needs of artificial intelligence.
